# TCTouchController

**Class**

An object that allows you to create and customize on-screen touch controls for a game that uses Metal.

## Declaration

```swift
class TCTouchController
```

## Overview

The controller exposes controls through a [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/GameController/GCController] instance, and enables seamless integration with the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/GameController] framework.

This class manages the lifecycle of touch controls, handles user interaction, renders the controls using Metal, and provides a `GCController` instance that reflects the state of the on-screen controls.

## Creating a touch controller

- **init(descriptor:)**: Creates a new instance with the provided descriptor.
- **TCTouchControllerDescriptor**: A descriptor for configuring a touch controller.

## Inspecting the touch controller

- **buttons**: An array containing all the button controls managed by this controller.
- **controls**: An array containing all the touch controls managed by this controller.
- **device**: The Metal device the touch control uses for rendering the touch controls.
- **directionPads**: An array containing all the direction pad controls managed by this controller.
- **drawableSize**: The size of the drawable to which the touch controller’s contents be drawn, in native pixels.
- **size**: The size of the view the touch controller’s drawable is embedded in, in points.
- **switches**: An array containing all the switch controls managed by this controller.
- **isConnected**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the touch controller is connected to the Game Controller framework.
- **isSupported**: Whether touch controllers are supported for the device.
- **throttles**: An array containing all the throttle controls managed by this controller.
- **thumbsticks**: An array containing all the thumbstick controls managed by this controller.
- **touchpads**: An array containing all the touchpad controls managed by this controller.

## Getting the touch controller

- **controller**: The game controller instance associated with this touch controller.

## Adding a button control

- **addButton(descriptor:)**: Creates a new button control with the provided descriptor, and adds it to the touch controller.
- **TCButtonDescriptor**: A descriptor for configuring a button.

## Adding a directional pad control

- **addDirectionPad(descriptor:)**: Creates a new direction pad control with the provided descriptor, and adds it to the touch controller.
- **TCDirectionPadDescriptor**: A descriptor for configuring a directional pad.

## Adding a switch control

- **addSwitch(descriptor:)**: Creates a new switch control with the provided descriptor, and adds it to the touch controller.
- **TCSwitchDescriptor**: A descriptor for configuring a switch.

## Adding a throttle control

- **addThrottle(descriptor:)**: Creates a new throttle control with the provided descriptor, and adds it to the touch controller.
- **TCThrottleDescriptor**: A descriptor for configuring a throttle.

## Adding a thumbstick control

- **addThumbstick(descriptor:)**: Creates a new thumbstick control with the provided descriptor, and adds it to the touch controller.
- **TCThumbstickDescriptor**: A descriptor for configuring a thumbstick.

## Adding a touchpad control

- **addTouchpad(descriptor:)**: Creates a new touchpad control with the provided descriptor, and adds it to the touch controller.
- **TCTouchpadDescriptor**: A descriptor for configuring a touchpad.

## Connecting and disconnecting a controller

- **connect()**: Connects the touch controller to the app, allowing its controls to be drawn and an associated `GCController` to be created.
- **disconnect()**: Disconnects the touch controller from the app, preventing its controls from being drawn.

## Getting the controller at a point

- **control(at:)**: The control at the specified point, if any.

## Handling layout updates

- **automaticallyLayoutControls(for:)**: Automatically lays out the provided control labels, creating them if needed.
- **render(using:)**: Renders the touch controls using the provided Metal render command encoder.

## Handling a touch

- **handleTouchBegan(at:index:)**: Handles a touch began event at the specified point.
- **handleTouchEnded(at:index:)**: Handles a touch ended event at the specified point.
- **handleTouchMoved(at:index:)**: Handles a touch moved event at the specified point.

## Removing controls

- **removeControl(_:)**: Removes the control from the touch controller.
- **removeAllControls()**: Removes all controls from the touch controller.

## Getting the touch controller category

- **TCGameControllerProductCategoryTouchController**

## Inherits From

- NSObject

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSObjectProtocol
